name: TOKYO LOVE+ (sexy mini-game1)
description:
This is a demo of one of the many sexy mini-games that you can play in the game when Akira (the player) turns on the computer and tries to play without being seen!

Please visit this campaign on Kickstarter and find out about Backer unique and limited rewards:
